name: FNAF Fan Game
description:
• Relive the terror of Five Nights at Freddy's in this 2D fan game!
  • Watch your power usage: Shine light on approaching animatronics to stop them from killing you!
  • Don't forget to check on Foxy in the Pirate's Cove.
  • Features "flashback" stages and a hidden comic

This game was created at the AfterFour summer camp program by one of the young campers with a little help from BluishGreenPro. Please be polite and encourage his game-making efforts in the comments!
